titles: Erubhin or Miscellanies Christian and Iudaicall, and others Penned for recreation at vacant houres. By Iohn Lightfoote, Master in Arts, sometimes of Christs Colledge in Cambridge.
author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.
publisher: Printed By G. Miller for Robert Swayne and William Adderton, and are to be sold [by R. Michell] at the Bulls head in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Jews --  History --  To 70 A.D. --  Early works to 1800.
